pub.citation: Angiosperm Phylogeny Group. An update of the Angiosperm Phylogeny Group classification for the orders and families of flowering plants: APG III. 2009. Botanical Journal of the Linnean Society 161: 105-121.

pmmd.notes: Unplaced families near garryales (icacinaceae,metteniusaceae,oncothecaceae), added for completeness
